channel.title: Creating/Adding X-Log hlp ; webclient help ; fixing range dupe ; fix spells ;
channel.description:
okay hey guys, well I was reading about A TON of stuff on here and i've come down to a few things that probably havent been posted considering the "search button" :] also im using Pk Planet Souce+Client--> http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,433417.0.html
--------------okay heres the list------------------
1.Creating/Adding a X-Log or x-system log //Fix the Wildy Range Dupe(dont know what that is in search bar type "range dupe")
2. How to limit The Connections to an Ip? // http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=337098.0
3. Reading this post http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,413731.0.html any clue on how to compile the .dat -> .jar -> .cache // Also will that provaide a 24/7 host?
4.My Spell Barrage Dosent Freeze Player/Npc
5.My Spell Rain, the action rains on my head not on other player/npc
6.Is there any possible way to produce a free host thats online 24/7 //i dont want someone saying of ill host it for u ty.
7.I Have A Auto Restarter and that seems the only way to start the server, is there anyway of skipping this and just Running the server, I opened Run.bat but it says missing java or something... //I'd like to run this server myself without the autostarter because I'd like the windows hidden/minized so it runs invisibly.
8.Get a list of items stats/bonus's are normal? //mine are all 0 because someone added custom items and it deleted all the other bonus's I have a temporary fix by editing the CombatExpRate 1 to 3
9.Fix The null's in Client //idk why but anyone know how to fix this(i know u have to add models and crap but anyone already fix it I mean)
10.Okay I edited the player to have owner in the source and player list but it dosent say anything..
11.Like in real runescape, your hp lvl is 99 then your actual hp is 990, how would i edit this?

item.title: Creating/Adding X-Log hlp ; webclient help ; fixing range dupe ; fix spells ;
item.dc:creator: @Zenadix Zenadix
item.description:
@Zenadix wrote:

Uhhmmm there was a variable to set the player HP, i just dont remember what it was, lets call it playerHP.

add in player.java,

playerHP = playerLevel[playerHitpoints]*10;

Read full topic
item.source: Creating/Adding X-Log hlp ; webclient help ; fixing range dupe ; fix spells ;

item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555

@usman555 wrote:

I haven’t been on an rsps for 9 months how do I know. Ty for telling me though.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol

@kneistol wrote:

ur wrong… a lot of ppls have done 990 hp on a server and x10 multiplier hit… and there is one tut on moparscape here…

Read full topic

item.title: Creating/Adding X-Log hlp ; webclient help ; fixing range dupe ; fix spells ;
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

You can probably work on these things on your own (a lot or most of them) and post probs you get when you are doing this.
Because we don’t spoonfeed.

As for Constitution, nobody did it yet so I advise not trying before someone makes a tutorial or something like that.

Read full topic
item.source: Creating/Adding X-Log hlp ; webclient help ; fixing range dupe ; fix spells ;

item.dc:creator: @brandon_oxfire brandon oxfire
item.description:
@brandon_oxfire wrote:

okay hey guys, well I was reading about A TON of stuff on here and i’ve come down to a few things that probably havent been posted considering the “search button” :] also im using Pk Planet Souce+Client–> http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,433417.0.html

--------------okay heres the list------------------

1.Creating/Adding a X-Log or x-system log //Fix the Wildy Range Dupe(dont know what that is in search bar type “range dupe”)

  1. How to limit The Connections to an Ip? // http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=337098.0

  2. Reading this post http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,413731.0.html any clue on how to compile the .dat -> .jar -> .cache // Also will that provaide a 24/7 host?

4.My Spell Barrage Dosent Freeze Player/Npc

5.My Spell Rain, the action rains on my head not on other player/npc

6.Is there any possible way to produce a free host thats online 24/7 //i dont want someone saying of ill host it for u ty.

7.I Have A Auto Restarter and that seems the only way to start the server, is there anyway of skipping this and just Running the server, I opened Run.bat but it says missing java or something… //I’d like to run this server myself without the autostarter because I’d like the windows hidden/minized so it runs invisibly.

8.Get a list of items stats/bonus’s are normal? //mine are all 0 because someone added custom items and it deleted all the other bonus’s I have a temporary fix by editing the CombatExpRate 1 to 3

9.Fix The null’s in Client //idk why but anyone know how to fix this(i know u have to add models and crap but anyone already fix it I mean)

10.Okay I edited the player to have owner in the source and player list but it dosent say anything…

11.Like in real runescape, your hp lvl is 99 then your actual hp is 990, how would i edit this?
